attributes.additional_details:
This petition is extremely important for the UK and the current economic crisis.

This so called Britain is suffering due to so many foreign people immigrating to the UK.

Many of which do actually work and cannot fault, but also take a massive percentage of their earned wages out of our country and our economy which damages us significantly.

This petition is to request to close the doors on our border, or to atleast refuse such amounts of of money to leave this country and enter their own economy.

This petition needs all the votes it can get.
In order to help the UK we need to stand up and speak up for ourselves.
